titlestmt.titleproper: Preliminary Guide to the Yale School of Drama Production Casebook Collection
Yale School of Drama Production Casebook Collection
titlestmt.author: Compiled by Colleen Reilly

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on Saturday December 8, 2018 at 00:04

did.unittitle: Yale School of Drama Production Casebook Collection
did.abstract: Collection contains dramaturg protocols and production research related to Yale School of Drama plays, submitted in partial fulfillment of dramaturgical coursework.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition
acqinfo.p: The Yale School of Drama Production Casebook Collection was housed in the former Drama Library until its transfer to the Robert B. Haas Family Arts Library in 2008.

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: The materials are open for research.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Yale School of Drama Production Casebook Collection, Robert B. Haas Family Arts Library, Yale University.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Collection contains dramaturg protocols and production research related to Yale School of Drama plays, submitted in partial fulfillment of dramaturgical coursework.

unittitle.title: Are You Now or Have You Ever Been
Death Comes to Us All, Mary Agnes
Narrow Road to the Deep North
Struggles of the Dogs and the Black
The Architect and the Emperor of Assyria
The Curse of the Starving Class
